review: Love it! So fast and easy to use with a ton of watching options. Glad I got it and it is a great replacement for no cable box in my bedroom!

review: Screen goes black - audio goes to a crackly mess. This thing is terrible after the latest update. No audio on Plex. Have to pull power and unplug from the TV multiple times a day. I'd go with something from another brand.

review: Love that it has an app for when you lose the remote!
